```{r, echo = TRUE}
library(knitr)
library(downloader)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)

brewires<-read.csv("Brewries.csv")
BrewCount <- brewires %>% count(brewires$State)
names(BrewCount)<-c("State","No. of Brewires")
kable(BrewCount,format = "html")
```
